Description: Cheetah Messaging enables marketers to manage and optimize cross-channel campaigns and interactions to improve your marketing performance.
Name: Cheetah

Methods.Name: Update Record
Methods.Description: It is used to submit and write data, one record at a time, to one or more joined tables, in your Messaging database.

Methods.Name: Search Record
Methods.Description: The Search Record endpoint is used to request details of a specified record, or records, in your database.
